compatibility.notes: OSL-3.0 allows for weak copyleft, meaning that while modifications to the original work must be licensed under OSL-3.0, derivative works can be licensed under different terms.

key_requirements: Include the license text with any distribution of the Original Work or Derivative Works.
State any changes made to the Original Work when creating Derivative Works.
license.name: OSL-3.0
obligations: Provide a machine-readable copy of the Source Code when distributing the Original Work or Derivative Works.
License any distributed copies of the Original Work or Derivative Works under the same Open Software License.
Do not use the names or trademarks of the Licensor or contributors without permission.
